guestmessage: Thank you for taking the time to share your valuable insights. Your feedback plays a crucial role in helping us improve the quality of care we provide to our patients and support you in your practice. This survey is designed to gather your experience, suggestions, and concerns regarding various hospital service related to OT. We appreciate your dedication and partnership in helping us provide the best possible care to our patients.
detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
recommendationmessage: On a scale of 0-10, how likely are you to recommend this hospital to other doctors, friends, or family members?
yourreason: Which of the following do you consider strengths of the hospital?

happythankyoumessage: Kindly rate us on our Google review page by clicking on the below link.
unhappythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback. We are committed to continuously improving and striving to meet your expectations.
